forecast.name: Washington's Birthday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 57, with temperatures falling to around 55 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 5 to 12 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy. Low around 45, with temperatures rising to around 47 overnight. Northwest wind 3 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
Downtown San Francisco awakens to the gentle embrace of a partly sunny morning, where the anticipated high near 57 degrees begins to weave warmth through the air. As the day progresses, temperatures will slide gracefully to around 55 in the afternoon, a reminder of the maritime influences that often linger in this coastal enclave. A soft breeze from the northwest, whispering between 5 and 12 mph, adds a refreshing quality, inviting those who venture outdoors to carry light jackets or cardigans; layering will be your ally today. The evening beckons with partly cloudy skies, a cool breeze swirling softly, and a low dipping to around 45 degrees, perfect for cozying up while absorbing the sights and sounds of the city as they shift with the fading light.

While the horizon appears generously clear, hints of haze may linger near the water, a subtle reminder of the marine layer that often graces the city in early mornings. The crisp air invites you to stroll through Golden Gate Park or sip a warm coffee from a nearby café while people-watching, a quieter pace that matches the day’s gentle unfolding. As twilight approaches, consider a leisurely walk along the waterfront—a chance to absorb the beauty of this unique location, forever caught between the rolling waves of the Pacific and the vibrant life of the city.
